EmployeeID_Requested_Insert.description: Generate and assign unique employee identification.
EmployeeID_Requested_Insert.email_body_template: Please issue an Employee ID for {employee_full_name} (Onboarding ID: {onboarding_id}). Manager: {manager}.

EmployeeID_Requested_Update.email_subject: Task Update: Employee ID Issuance for {employee_full_name}
EmployeeID_Requested_Update.email_body_template: Please update the Employee ID task for {employee_full_name} (Onboarding ID: {onboarding_id}). Manager: {manager}. Changes: {details}

EmployeeID_Requested_Delete.email_subject: Task Cancelled: Employee ID Issuance for {employee_full_name}
EmployeeID_Requested_Delete.email_body_template: Please cancel the Employee ID task for {employee_full_name} (Onboarding ID: {onboarding_id}). Manager: {manager}. Reason: {details}

PurchasingCard_Requested_Insert.description: Process application and order employee purchasing card.
PurchasingCard_Requested_Insert.email_body_template: Please order a Purchasing Card for {employee_full_name} (Onboarding ID: {onboarding_id}). Manager: {manager}.

PurchasingCard_Requested_Update.email_body_template: Please update the Purchasing Card task for {employee_full_name} (Onboarding ID: {onboarding_id}). Manager: {manager}. Changes: {details}

PurchasingCard_Requested_Delete.email_body_template: Please cancel the Purchasing Card task for {employee_full_name} (Onboarding ID: {onboarding_id}). Manager: {manager}. Reason: {details}

GasCard_Requested_Insert.description: Process application and order employee gas card.
GasCard_Requested_Insert.email_body_template: Please order a Gas Card for {employee_full_name} (Onboarding ID: {onboarding_id}). Manager: {manager}.

GasCard_Requested_Update.email_body_template: Please update the Gas Card task for {employee_full_name} (Onboarding ID: {onboarding_id}). Manager: {manager}. Changes: {details}

GasCard_Requested_Delete.email_body_template: Please cancel the Gas Card task for {employee_full_name} (Onboarding ID: {onboarding_id}). Manager: {manager}. Reason: {details}

TLCBonus_Requested_Insert.description: Process TLC bonus eligibility for employee.
TLCBonus_Requested_Insert.email_body_template: Please mark {employee_full_name} (Onboarding ID: {onboarding_id}) as TLC Bonus Eligible. Manager: {manager}.
TLCBonus_Requested_Insert.sms_message_template: Task: TLC Bonus Eligible for {employee_full_name} (ID: {onboarding_id}). Manager: {manager}.

TLCBonus_Requested_Update.description: Update request for TLC bonus eligibility.
TLCBonus_Requested_Update.email_subject: Task Update: TLC Bonus Eligible for {employee_full_name}
TLCBonus_Requested_Update.email_body_template: Please update the TLC Bonus Eligible task for {employee_full_name} (Onboarding ID: {onboarding_id}). Manager: {manager}. Changes: {details}

TLCBonus_Requested_Delete.email_subject: Task Cancelled: TLC Bonus Eligible for {employee_full_name}
TLCBonus_Requested_Delete.email_body_template: Please cancel the TLC Bonus Eligible task for {employee_full_name} (Onboarding ID: {onboarding_id}). Manager: {manager}. Reason: {details}
TLCBonus_Requested_Delete.sms_message_template: CANCELLED: TLC Bonus Eligible for {employee_full_name}. Reason: {details}
